creator: bsv@belrail.com
text:
when I post parameters from JSP with UTF-8 and JavaScript encode() - I loss 
this parameter.

code=1&name=2&desc=/u1215 - I get only code and name, but for desc I must 
manually parse query string

This is not a valid bug report. You have to %xx encode each byte. Then, if you 
want to control char decoding of the bytes once they are decoded, you should 
use a POST body (there is no known standard for URLs, although TC will use 
UTF8). It's not clear from the report what you want to do.
creator: remm@apache.org
